Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: theatiki
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Meet all my expectations. Takes crystal clear pictures and videos. Very easy to use and small enough to tote around.

Reviews.Title: Great package, great price
Reviews.Author: Mtorres31
Reviews.Content: The description was very accurate. Had chosen the camera prior to purchase at a local target store but I decided to buy online since I felt I could get a better deal and I did. Very happy with the shipping time and price

ProductInfo.Features:
Built in Wi-Fi for wireless transfer of images to social networking sites
8X Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens -- ECO mode for economy power consumption
16.0 MP sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor and 720p HD video recording
Smart AUTO with 32 pedefined photo capture settings
Kit Includes Original Canon Supplied accessories, + Dane-Elec 8 GB Class 10 Memory Card, Card Reader, Nice Fitted Case, Table Tripod, Memory Card Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 8 GB Kit
